      • AICharacter

        public AICharacter(Game game,
                   com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 spawnLocation,
                   java.lang.String name,
                   Role role,
                   HumanCharacter player,
                   com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture spriteTexture,
                   int spriteWidth,
                   int spriteHeight)
        Parameters:
        game - : The game of which the entity belongs to
        spawnLocation - : The location where the AI will start from
        name - : The name of the AI, here we can make a difference between a normal one and a boss
        role - : the role of the ai
        player - : the player the ai will follow
        spriteHeight - The height of characters sprite
        spriteTexture - Texture to use for this AI
        spriteWidth - The width of characters sprite
